Item Description The EC-1000FM has all of the classy LTD Deluxe features that set it apart from other guitars in its range, such as abalone inlays and purfling, full body/neck/headstock binding, and premier components like LTD locking tuners, a Tonepros locking TOM bridge and tailpiece, and classic Seymour Duncan JB/’59 passive pickups. It also offers set-neck construction with a mahogany body, a flamed maple top, 3 pc. mahogany neck, and 24-fret rosewood fingerboard. Available in Amber Sunburst finish.
